programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Michele and her son plan to drive their tiny house across the country; John coaches Michele through House Driving 101.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Angela and Elizabeth have gotten rid of almost everything they owned in order to pursue their dream of opening an eco-feminist retreat center on the beautiful big island of Hawaii.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Looking for a home for a healthy diet, healthy lifestyle, and studying.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Jason and Emily and their two kids have been living in what some might consider a McMansion, but this family is ready to start a new chapter and it all begins with going tiny.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: When a Florida couple gives up their huge condo so they can hit the road, John and Zack attempt to build a tiny house where the nocturnal nurse and his sun-loving bride can coexist.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The Dallas zombie flippers purchase an outdated, cheap investor flip with a poorly constructed garage-to-bedroom conversion; the challenge for Chauncey and Derek is to keep the flip within the 45-day timeline and $45,000 budget.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Keith takes the team to see a house in the Wadeview Park neighborhood that he's been chasing for two years due to probate issues; in Keith's mind, it's been time well-spent because of the low price.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: What seems like a sweet deal turns out to be quite stinky; although the backyard boasts a well-constructed shed that has a lot of potential, the house is covered, floor-to-ceiling, with dog excrement and filled with spooky surprises.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Keith is skeptical about this tiny house overrun with critters; Ashlee takes over as builder; a natural disaster puts a giant branch through the house, the entire roof is replaced, and the team worries that this flip could be their first flop.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The zombie team has little time for an additional flip, and they don't have the cash on hand; When a good deal appears, the team decides it could be worth it if they can work fast and limit their loan interest to a single one-month payment.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Keith finds this house on a massive lot and convinces the team to take it on. They decide the best plan is to flip the house, split the lot, and sell the extra land. When they file for the permit, Keith gets news that could open up lots of problems.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The team finds a ramshackle house down the street from a new school opening in a couple of months; a glut of plumbing and roof problems, plus a tree-toppling disaster, may cause the team to miss their sales window before the school year starts.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
